thread.title: 'Slap Kalesh' During Religious Satsang As Fight Breaks Out | Watch Video | Times Now
thread.title_full: 'Slap Kalesh' During Religious Satsang As Fight Breaks Out | Watch Video | Times Now

author: Kanishka Singharia
title: 'Slap Kalesh' During Religious Satsang As Fight Breaks Out | Watch Video | Times Now
text: A video capturing a surprising incident during a religious satsang has gone viral. In the footage, a woman dressed in a yellow suit is seen reciting bhajans on a microphone. Amidst the devotional singing, a dramatic altercation erupted, catching everyone's attention. As the woman continued her bhajan, a man wearing spectacles suddenly began attacking another man who was standing nearby, repeatedly slapping him. The unexpected violence caused the woman to pause her singing. She then addressed the man with a bag on the microphone, asking, \"Kya hua?\" (What happened?). The caption of the viral video reads: 'Slap Kalesh'The location of this incident remains unknown, and the reason behind the brawl has not been identified. The video, however, has sparked curiosity and reactions from viewers.The satsang, which started as a serene event, was abruptly interrupted by the physical altercation, leaving attendees and viewers shocked. Despite the woman’s attempt to maintain the devotional atmosphere, the fight dominated the scene. Slap-Kalesh During a Live Performance pic.twitter.com/Xp5jlFXzSE— Ghar Ke Kalesh (@gharkekalesh) May 23, 2024 ]]>Here's how social media reacted: A user wrote: \"Virat Kohli meeting Glenn Maxwell after the match.\" Another said: When she asked \"Kya Hua\" A third user wrote: \"Very enjoyable moment.\" A fourth said: \"Waiting for the answer of KYA HUA\"
